familyMemberEthics.description: This asset is not described in Ivanka Trump's 2017 financial disclosure, but it is referenced as a holding of 666 KC Management, LLC. While the holding company reportedly has been divested, the full status of 666 Fifth Management LLC is unclear.

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $3,000,000 in Management Fee Income from 666 KC MANAGEMENT, LLC (Management company; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Managing Member of 666 KC Management, LLC from Oct 1, 2011, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received 3000000 in Management Fee Income income from 666 KC MANAGEMENT, LLC (Management company; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Because his interest in this entity reportedly has been divested, the potential conflict of interest is marked in this database as resolved.
